data.text2: Your BE team has just arrived at the ECP to begin response operations. Select the Incident Commander to learn what your team is hearing about at the scene.
data.text3: You have just arrived at the ECP to begin response operations. Select the Incident Commander for your on-scene briefing.
data.text5: You have just arrived at the ECP to begin response operations. Select the Incident Commander for your on-scene briefing.
